apps.name: JavDB
apps.versionDescription:
- [中文] 修正播放器倍速播放面板滑動引發的音量調節問題(無播放需求可不更新)
- [English] Fixed a volume adjustment problem caused by sliding the player's multiplier panel (no need to update if there is no playback demand).
 More Info:
 https://github.com/bdvajstudio/javdb/releases/tag/v1.9.16
apps.subtitle: Online Information source for adult movies

versions.localizedDescription:
- [中文] 修正播放器倍速播放面板滑動引發的音量調節問題(無播放需求可不更新)
- [English] Fixed a volume adjustment problem caused by sliding the player's multiplier panel (no need to update if there is no playback demand).
 More Info:
 https://github.com/bdvajstudio/javdb/releases/tag/v1.9.16

- APP 啟動時的選擇線路界面優化，超時或連接不上時，可手動選擇線路進行嘗試
- 將 TOP250 和看熱播欄目整合到排行榜
- 播放器支持長按以 2 倍速播放
- 影片詳情頁，長按演員頭像複製其名稱到剪貼板
- 長按左上角返回或物理返回鍵，將直接返回首屏
- TOP250 排行年份篩選增加至今年
- 上傳未到帳截圖時可附加說明文字
- 修復有碼演員篩選滑塊會觸發後退上一界面的問題
- 修復播放器全屏時，在狀態欄下拉會觸發音量調節的問題
- 其他問題修正和優化
 More Info:
 https://github.com/bdvajstudio/javdb/releases/tag/v1.9.15

apps.localizedDescription:
JavDB, the most comprehensive online database of adult videos, and you can search and view all of adult videos in Japan with Censored, Uncensored, Western, Anime and FC2.

 More Info:
 https://javdb.com

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: Allows JavDB to access Camera to take picture.

privacy.name: FaceID
privacy.usageDescription: Allows JavDB to unlock the app.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: Allows JavDB to access images and media files.
